Project Manager 2, Business Unit, Bengaluru

Central Operations, Business Unit Role

About the Role

We are looking for a self-motivated and results-driven General Manager in Belgium to direct and manage our organisation’s business activities and to develop and implement effective strategies and programs across the Belgium business functions as required by the Ixaris Group.

What you’ll do

  • Leading the company and ensuring all employees buy into the company and the group vision

  • Setting the overall strategic direction of the company alongside the board

  • Planning and implementing long term business strategies to achieve the company’s objectives

  • Meeting with the Finance Manager on a regular basis to review the company’s financial performance

  • Interviewing for senior positions within the organisation and signing off offers of employment

  • Working closely with the Group Sales Director on sales strategy and approach to winning new business

What you’ll Need

  • Degree in Business Management, Master’s in Business Administration or similar

  • Previous experience in the payments or travel industry is a must and experience in a regulated business is a plus

  • Good knowledge of different business functions, proven track record of successfully managing similar sized organisations

  • Natural leader and motivator of people

  • Excellent communication skills

  • Target driven and results focused individual
